org.giiwa.task

类 Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.task.Task
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    直接已知子类:
    backup.BackupTask, backup.RecoverTask, BackupTask, CleanupTask, NtpTask, PerfMoniterTask, RecycleTask, StatTask, SysTask

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    The Task Class use for create a runnable distributed Task, and includes schedule method.
    the sub task class can override getName, onExecute, onFinish; 
     getName: default increase number, only can be scheduled one time for same name, 
              the later schedule will cancel the previous schedule if not running
 onExecute: the main entry of the task
 onFinish: will be invoked when finished the task

    all the task that scheduled by worker task, will be queued and executed by a thread pool, the thread number was configured in giiwa.properties "thread.number";
    作者:
    joe
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
